summary: INTERMITTENT AIR BAG WARNING LIGHT.  TOOK VEHICLE TO FORD DEALER THEY WERE ABLE TO TEST VIA NGS HOOKUP, WHICH SHOWED CODE U2017. REPLACED PART YF1Z-14B321-EA CONTR ASY-OCC., PER SPECIAL SERVICE MESSAGE #14579.  THOUGHT THIS MIGHT BE OF INTREST GIVEN THERE IS A INQUIRY INVOLVING THE 2001 TAURUS AIR BAG SYSTEM.  *AK
